articles.title: People with anaphylaxis can get vaccinated with Pfizer-BioNTech, Moderna jabs from June 5 - TODAYonline
articles.description: SINGAPORE — From Saturday (June 5), members of the public who have had a history of anaphylaxis and who have been unable to get vaccinated with the messenger ribonucleic acid (mRNA) Covid-19 vaccines used here will be able to do so.
